summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for transportation charges incurred on various shipments. The invoice details the charges, discounts, and shipment summaries, including the names of recipients and senders involved in the transactions.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the primary account holder for the FedEx services detailed in the invoice, with multiple shipments listed under his name.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is mentioned as a recipient of packages sent by Jeffrey E. Epstein, indicating a connection through shipping transactions.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein sent packages to Jeanne Brennan as indicated in the shipment details of the invoice.

events.title: FedEx Invoice Issued
events.description: FedEx issued an invoice to Jeffrey E. Epstein for transportation charges totaling $234.01 for various shipments.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022
6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, VI 00802
keyFacts: The invoice number is 1-858-12740, dated June 14, 2004.
Total charges for the invoice amount to $234.01.
Multiple shipments are detailed, with Jeanne Brennan as a recipient for some of the packages.
The invoice includes a breakdown of transportation charges and discounts applied.
